message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder
The inflation is hurting me, Bob. I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile.
Inflation is taking its toll on your share, I'm willing to take a bit more
Bob, let's be realistic.  The longer this goes on, the less valuable the money becomes for me. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point.
